meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a yuppie.
meanings.sent1: The new cafe had a yuppieish vibe with its trendy decor and expensive coffee.
meanings.sent2: She wore a yuppieish outfit to the business meeting, complete with designer accessories.
meanings.sent3: The yuppieish couple argued over which luxury car to buy next.
meanings.sent4: His yuppieish behavior at the charity event raised eyebrows among the attendees.
meanings.sent5: The yuppieish neighborhood was filled with upscale boutiques and gourmet restaurants.

meanings.definition: Having the qualities or characteristics associated with yuppies.
meanings.sent1: Their yuppieish lifestyle included frequent brunches and expensive vacations.
meanings.sent2: The yuppieish attitude of the young professionals was evident in their pursuit of success.
meanings.sent3: She jokingly referred to her friend's yuppieish taste in avocado toast.
meanings.sent4: The yuppieish mindset of always wanting the latest gadgets can be exhausting.
meanings.sent5: The yuppieish couple's home was filled with modern furniture and high-tech gadgets.
